rpg.v4.server.entity.slot
Interface SlotCriteria

All Known Implementing Classes:
ArmorCriteria, DummyCriteria, GenericCriteria, WeaponCriteria
public interface SlotCriteria

Created by IntelliJ IDEA. User: Sven-Ivar Fjeld Date: 07-Apr-2007 Time: 13:09:05

Allows checking whether or not the equipment that is to be equipped can actually be equipped by this entity. This takes into account such things as number of hands free vs. num of hands required to hold or weild the equipment, size etc.

Method Summary
 boolean match(V4ItemCapsule itemCapsule)
          Does this object match the criteria?
 

Method Detail

match

boolean match(V4ItemCapsule itemCapsule)
Does this object match the criteria?

Parameters:
itemCapsule - Equipment to be tested if it can be equipped or not
Returns:
true if equipment passes this criteria, false otherwise (i.e. equipment cant be equipped in the current state
